record.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.J. RES. 20, FURTHER CONTINUING APPROPRIATIONS, FISCAL YEAR 2007
record.chair: The pending business is the vote on ordering the previous question on House Resolution 116, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the joint resolution.
record.chair: The question is on ordering the previous question.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I demand a recorded vote.
